Room.Name: Hermit's Cave
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the cave of Xandaus the wise hermit.
Room.LongDescription: You had expected rocks to sit on, and perhaps a small fire in the center of the cave, but instead the place is nicely furnished with old but expensive furniture. One wall is floor to ceiling with books and a comfortable chair is positioned for the best light to read by. He is a wise hermit, afterall. A fireplace and hearth has been constructed of stone and provides a cheerful atmosphere to the cave.
